Class InterphaseTwoPhasePipeFlow

java.lang.Object
neqsim.fluidmechanics.flownode.fluidboundary.interphasetransportcoefficient.InterphaseTransportCoefficientBaseClass
neqsim.fluidmechanics.flownode.fluidboundary.interphasetransportcoefficient.interphasetwophase.InterphaseTwoPhase
neqsim.fluidmechanics.flownode.fluidboundary.interphasetransportcoefficient.interphasetwophase.interphasepipeflow.InterphaseTwoPhasePipeFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterphaseTransportCoefficientInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
InterphaseDropletFlow, InterphaseSlugFlow, InterphaseStratifiedFlow
public class InterphaseTwoPhasePipeFlow extends InterphaseTwoPhase

InterphaseTwoPhasePipeFlow class.

Base class for interphase transport coefficients in two-phase pipe flow. Provides methods for calculating Sherwood numbers (mass transfer) and Nusselt numbers (heat transfer) based on flow pattern-specific correlations.

Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
esol

  • Method Details

    • calcSherwoodNumber

      public double calcSherwoodNumber(int phaseNum, double reynoldsNumber, double schmidtNumber, FlowNodeInterface node)

      Calculates the Sherwood number for interphase mass transfer. The Sherwood number is the dimensionless mass transfer coefficient: Sh = k_L * L / D where k_L is the mass transfer coefficient, L is the characteristic length, and D is the diffusivity.

      Parameters:
      phaseNum - the phase number (0 for gas, 1 for liquid)
      reynoldsNumber - the Reynolds number
      schmidtNumber - the Schmidt number (μ/ρD)
      node - the flow node
      Returns:
      the Sherwood number

    • calcWallSherwoodNumber

      public double calcWallSherwoodNumber(int phaseNum, double reynoldsNumber, double schmidtNumber, FlowNodeInterface node)

      Calculates the wall Sherwood number for mass transfer to the pipe wall.

      Parameters:
      phaseNum - the phase number (0 for gas, 1 for liquid)
      reynoldsNumber - the Reynolds number
      schmidtNumber - the Schmidt number
      node - the flow node
      Returns:
      the wall Sherwood number

    • calcNusseltNumber

      public double calcNusseltNumber(int phaseNum, double reynoldsNumber, double prandtlNumber, FlowNodeInterface node)

      Calculates the Nusselt number for interphase heat transfer. The Nusselt number is the dimensionless heat transfer coefficient: Nu = h * L / k where h is the heat transfer coefficient, L is the characteristic length, and k is thermal conductivity.

      Parameters:
      phaseNum - the phase number (0 for gas, 1 for liquid)
      reynoldsNumber - the Reynolds number
      prandtlNumber - the Prandtl number (μ*Cp/k)
      node - the flow node
      Returns:
      the Nusselt number

    • calcMassTransferCoefficientFromSherwood

      public double calcMassTransferCoefficientFromSherwood(double sherwoodNumber, double characteristicLength, double diffusivity)

      Calculates the mass transfer coefficient from Sherwood number.

      Parameters:
      sherwoodNumber - the Sherwood number
      characteristicLength - the characteristic length in meters
      diffusivity - the diffusivity in m²/s
      Returns:
      the mass transfer coefficient in m/s

    • calcHeatTransferCoefficientFromNusselt

      public double calcHeatTransferCoefficientFromNusselt(double nusseltNumber, double characteristicLength, double thermalConductivity)

      Calculates the heat transfer coefficient from Nusselt number.

      Parameters:
      nusseltNumber - the Nusselt number
      characteristicLength - the characteristic length in meters
      thermalConductivity - the thermal conductivity in W/(m·K)
      Returns:
      the heat transfer coefficient in W/(m²·K)
